description: Bugbane (Actaea dahurica) is an amazing plant species! Its bright green foliage and white flowers are lovely sights in any garden and it's a robust perennial, tolerating dry conditions and some shade. Its fragrant white flower spikes provide a spectacular bloom in late summer while its unique foliage can be used to create lush meadows, winding pathways, and delicate flower beds. Plus, had enough of pesky bugs? Bugbane also deters them due to its minty smell. If youâ€™re looking for a stunning specimen that requires minimal maintenance, Bugbane is the right choice!
